name: My Catpanion (Demo)
description:
My Catpanion is an idle and tamagotchi type game. Taking care of your cat unlocks a multitude of different items and mini games to make your cat the happiest being in the multiverse. I plan on finishing the game fully down the road. I've listed the things that will be included into the 1.0 version of the game down below.

Things that didn't make it into the game:

Upgrades

Toys!!

Customizable settings

Some items

Choice of music

Saves

Choice of cat

Cosmetics

Cool animations

Game showing date and time

Credits to the people and assets that created this project:

BriaBunnyBuns - Lead Artist

Ancient Modern Tales Font by Chequered Ink

Retro Pixelated Living Room Sofa Night Background Design by 千图网

8 Bits Elements by Game Sound Solutions

Downtown Walk by FSM Team feat. < e s c p >

Water Bottle Sprite on ShutterSprite

Thank you for taking your time in checking out the game! Definitely follow for updates on the game. You won't be disappointed!!
